nodes.text: Allegiance 3 is the third, penultimate issue of the canon comic book miniseries Star Wars: Allegiance. It was written by Ethan Sacks, illustrated by Luke Ross, and published on October 23, 2019 by Marvel Comics. The issue features the story "Dark Side of the Moon," which is set after the events of the 2017 film Star Wars: Episode VIII The Last Jedi.

BEFORE THE EXCITING EVENTS OF STAR WARS: THE RISE OF SKYWALKER! Decades after Imperial occupation enslaved their planet, there are those willing to stop at nothing to prevent another war from bloodying the waters of Mon Cala.
